obj_ch2_room_town_hospital_slash_Step_0_: * "Silver Drake?" I've never beaten this boss before...
* Alright, hand it over, honey! I got this!
* Silver Drake, huh? That's a new one.
* No, dad! This is my battle!
* Alright, what's the plan, honey?
* ... So, um, how about just telling me what to do?
* Hmm... maybe we could try...
* Haha, sure! How about trying Fireshock?
* Iceshock?
* I'd love to, dad, but the mage left the party.
* Ice on the Ice Palace boss?
* Don't you wanna try Fireshock or something?
* Oh yeah. How about one of your 99 Blaze Potions?
* Umm, I'm saving those?
* For what? Your birthday? C'mon, live a little!
* OK, dad! This one's for you! Hiyah!
* H-huh? Yeah, you're right.
* It... reflects fire attacks.
* Here, how about letting me control for a bit?
* Hahaha! Whoops - hey, you gotta heal!
* I wish I knew healing magic in real life.
* Then I'd make you better and...
* It wouldn't... just be me and mom.
* ... your mother is...
* Hey, it's ok, sweetheart. I'm getting better.
* N-no! I'll... control it myself.
* Might even be able to go to church tomorrow.
* Not like you to be a controller hog, honey.
* ... really? Are you... sure you're okay?
* You feeling alright?
* "Holidays happen whether you like it or not!"
* "Even though everyone likes holidays."
* ... Well, gotta go home soon or mom will call.
* Huh? Me? Of course! I'm fine, dad...
* I just...
* I fell asleep in the library, and...
* ... you know, just had a weird dream. Haha.
* See you tomorrow, honey.
* Noelle...
* I knew that birdbrain'd put you to sleep! Haha!
* Bye, dad. Love you!
* What'd he do? Start lecturing you on his theorum...
* Of the inequality in children's fighter games?
* Hahah, no, no! He...
* ... he fell asleep, too.
* Wow, he even put himself to sleep? Ha!
* Haha, yeah, I guess so!
* Well. Sounds like...
* You two've been hitting the books too hard.
* Why don't you go home and hibernate?
* I'll see you tomorrow at church.
Hell if I know???
* SUSIE!?!? WHY ARE YOU HERE!?\f1
* Dad? Are you gonna be okay to go...?
* Sorry guys, this game's only one-player!
* Of course! You take it easy, honey.
* Ummm... dad... this is... umm, Susie!
* Ohhhhhhh! THIS is Susie!
* Okay then... yeah, I'll go home and rest.
* Susie! Nice! Heard a lot about you!
* You, uh... have???
* COOL, THINK I HAVE TO GO NOW!!!
* Susie, huh?
* ... Yeah.
* Lay a finger on her and I'll kick your ass.
* Huh?
* Hahaha!! Hahahaha!! Just kidding!!
* Well, kinda kidding.
* Kris!?
* Kris, what are you doing here?
* Hell if I know.
* S-SUSIE!?
* Hey, Susie. Mind if I have a word with you a sec?
* (Guess I'll be a sec, Kris...?)
obj_ch4_DCA01_slash_Step_0_gml_78_0: * Heh, too bad, was looking forward to another adventure...

obj_ch4_DCA02_slash_Step_0_gml_83_0: * ... it's looking for someone else to...

obj_ch4_DCA02_slash_Step_0_gml_419_0: * If someone's really hurt, don't... try to fix it alone, okay?
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_117_0: * Yes, Susie! We are the Heroes of the Prophecy...
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_124_0: * ... Which, I, was trying to explain when we met...
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_126_0: * Okay, yeah, yeah, I get it.
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_133_0: * Yeah, guess you said something like that, huh.
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_137_0: * Still... kinda... cool to see us up there, y'know?
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_197_0: * Hey, who the hell's messing with us!?
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_560_0: * Wh... who... huh... what the HELL are YOU doing!?
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_592_0: * But, hrm. Seems I got a little lost.
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_609_0: * You wouldn't mind walking me back to my study, wouldja?

obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_629_0: * Ah, I see, I see. Good enough reason, that one.

obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_747_0: * (Ugh, things'll get messy if he gets hurt!)
obj_ch4_DCA04_slash_Step_0_gml_748_0: * Fine! You can go with us. Just don't slow us down.

obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_65_0: * You, um... haven't seen a shadowy figure, have you?
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_67_0: * Hm... now that you mention it... Just before you came in...
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_68_0: * A figure with a sword flew in that door up there.
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_84_0: * But, it's locked with some contraption.
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_85_0: * I reckon if you could get to the \cYEast Belltower\cW, you might be able to open it...
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_86_0: * But, scalin' the \cYBelltower\cW doesn't seem easy without tools.
obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_87_0: * Meanwhile, the \cYNorthwest Library\cW's got lots o' nice books.

obj_ch4_DCA07_slash_Step_0_gml_90_0: * (Yeah, like we're gonna waste time wandering around there...)
obj_ch4_DCA08A_slash_Step_0_gml_71_0: * Kris, maybe you can play 'em on a piano somewhere?
obj_ch4_DCA08A_slash_Step_0_gml_73_0: * Good idea, Susie! But, doesn't the song look, um...
obj_ch4_DCA08A_slash_Step_0_gml_76_0: * ... huh? Yeah, guess we gotta find the other half?

obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_42_0: * Amazing, Kris! You already knew the answer...
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_43_0: * ... You must really... know a lot of things, don't you.
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_57_0: * Amazing, Kris! You solved it without the second hint...
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_58_0: * ... You must really... be an expert on the prophecy.
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_74_0: * All we had to do was follow the prophecy thing.
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_97_0: * If it's that easy, maybe we should just do whatever it says?
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_98_0: * How about it, Ralsei. Wanna memorize it for us?
obj_ch4_DCA08B_slash_Step_0_gml_130_0: * ... umm, that's okay, Susie. I already know it.
obj_ch4_DCA08C_slash_Step_0_gml_67_0: * ... hey, Ralsei. If you know the whole prophecy already...
obj_ch4_DCA08C_slash_Step_0_gml_68_0: * ... why didn't you just say how to do the piano?
obj_ch4_DCA08C_slash_Step_0_gml_71_0: * I just thought, isn't it better if I don't... say anything?
obj_ch4_DCA08C_slash_Step_0_gml_148_0: * H-Hey, I think I found a light!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_233_0: * ... VERY WELL... IF YOU COME CLOASER TO THIS PLACE...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_520_0: * N... NO... DOAN'T LOOK... I'M... I'M...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_558_0: * Are you all right? The chandelier... It...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_583_0: * OUCHI... OHHH, IT HOARTS... IT HOARTS...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_587_0: * We're sorry, we were just looking for a way...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_589_0: * OH... MY HEAD... IT HOARTS... IT HOARTS INSIDE
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_591_0: * Um, don't worry! We know how to use healing, so...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_657_0: * H-huh? Sorry, I guess I'll, um, try it again...!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_857_0: * Shouldn't you be busy... writing a letter or something?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_880_0: * ... Shouldn't you be helping that pumpkin fella?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_882_0: * Nah, Ralsei's got it covered. I... I quit.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_916_0: * You know. Healing. That green sparkle thing.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_946_0: * Hmm. So you don't like doing it?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_949_0: * At first, I was really... I was really excited I could do it.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_950_0: * But like... I sort of realized...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_951_0: * I just suck at it. Heh.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_989_0: * What if you practiced? Put a little shell into it.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_991_0: * I mean, I kind of... When people aren't looking...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_992_0: * I was kind of trying to practice a little, but...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_994_0: * I'll never be as good as Ralsei, so what's the point?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_995_0: * So everyone can see how... bad I am?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_996_0: * I should just stick to what I'm good for.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1051_0: * Didn't take you for a purple bellied coward.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1053_0: * Coward...? Hey, what do you mean by that!?
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1055_0: * You're afraid of making some little green sparkles.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1077_0: * Look, just CASTING it isn't a big deal!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1107_0: * I pricked my finger with my pen earlier.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1108_0: * If yer not a coward, give me your best shot!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1110_0: * Fine, if it gets you to shut up!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1187_0: * OH!!!! THE OUCHI... THE HOART... IT'S GONE!!!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1219_0: * Susie, that was a great idea!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1223_0: * I was wondering why my healing wasn't working...
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1224_0: * I suppose... I was only healing the outside.
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1225_0: * But Susie, your healing blast seemed to hit the spot!
obj_ch4_DCA08D_slash_Step_0_gml_1228_0: * Well, heh, I was uh, actually just trying to heal that old man...

Oh my god, so like, the Angel,
that's watching over all of us?

It has, like, this COOL prophecy,
like, foretold by time and space.

And, like, um...
ummm... like, like...

OK, so like, I'm kind of
paraphrasing here, but,

There's, like, these heroes,
and they're like, SO cool.

They have like,
swords and stuff?

And there's one with like,
ummm, horns?
He's honestly SO cute.

I mean, there, like,
aren't any pictures, but like,

IDK why, I just imagine him,
as, like, cute!

Like, OMG, pinch his cheeks and
give him a pumpkin pie!

Give him a, like, a fat-free
cat food coupon clipping!

We, have like, such A HUGE pile
of those to get rid of OMG

But, like, what's amazing,
is how, like, these heroes,

Are like,
oh my god, they're like...

The thing is, they could be like,
any one of us, you know?
So, like, that's the thing, like,

You gotta keep in mind
we could ALL be!!!

Someone that might
change the world, right?

So we should all, like...
be nice to each other, right?

That's, like, the main... thingy?
Of our religion, right?

Like, just be nice to everyone!
We're all family!

No matter what kinda person
or who they are!

Like, we believe weird crap
but we're totally, like, welcoming!

You don't know who's gonna
grow up to be a hero, right?

Like... even maybe, like,
I'm actually a Hero too?

Like, maybe I'm keeping
a secret from you guys...?

Psyche!
It's totally not me hahaha.

... or is it?? Like, totally keeping
you guessing, right?

And yeah, like, OK, yeah,
that's not the whole thing.

Maybe bad things happen
in the story too.

Like... what's it called?
A calamity?

But, like, it's like,
all cool because, like...

OK actually
I don't remember what happens???

I always fell asleep
during the reading TBH LOLLLLL

Oh my god while I'm, like, up here,
can I like, give some shout outs?
Like, shout-out to my mom and dad...
Hey mom and dad!
And, like, shout out to my little sister,
Who couldn't make it here today.

IDK what she's doing,
communing with demons or something? LOL

Yeah, she like, DOES that.
LOL. So cute am I right???
She should come here and like,

Bask in like,
some totally holy light some time.

Lap her tongue
in the holy bowl of cat drinking water -

Oh my god, what?
That's not for drinking?

OMG, I kept drinking it
because I was thirsty!! LOL!!
OMG!!! Hahahahaha!!!
Hahahahaha!!!

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_88_0: * That's your \cRSOUL\cW, the culmination of your being!

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_90_0: * ... and the FATE of the world.

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_92_0: * If everyone's HP reaches 0, we'll lose the battle.

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_115_0:

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_120_0:

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_129_0: * So, umm, maybe you could stop defending?

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_145_0: * Now, if I use my \cYPACIFY\cW spell on it...

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_150_0: * If you had, um, hit the enemy, it'd be TIRED now.
obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_151_0: * In that case, we use my \cYPACIFY\cW spell on it...
obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_169_0: * Let's skip over them for now, OK?

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_206_0: * Kris, please ask me to do a spell.

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_222_0: * Kris, what if you just give me a hand sign?
obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_227_0: *\E8 Ummm, if this is too difficult...
obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_228_0: * Let's move to the next lesson, OK?

obj_dummyenemy_slash_Step_0_gml_253_0: * Now I have just a little more to teach you!

obj_dw_church_a_intro1_slash_Step_0_gml_: * (Hey Kris, I know you're probably creeped out, but...)
* (You do know you can run, right?)
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_54_: * Damn... so this is the Magic Axe, huh.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_59_: * Damn... I dunno what this axe is, but it looks awesome!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_107: * Wait a tick! You gotta pay for that!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_130: * ... Pay!? The heck are you talking about?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_147: * This is still the inside of my study, ain't it?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_171: * Nothin' else was free, so why'd ya think we'd start here?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_173: * Haha, good one. I'm taking the axe now.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_175: * ... don't think I'm serious? Check the price tag!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_224: * Geh heh heh, didn't realize it was still on discount!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_225: * ... But I know. You worked real hard to get here. So how 'bout a trade?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_226: * If you, and you alone, can best my challenge... I give it to ya. For free.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_228: * Heh, knew you'd say that. What do you want?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_234: * Alright, sure. Which hair you want me to cut?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_290: * They're all too long, see! Just get one, and I'll give it to ya.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_300: * Alright, I'll start with your beard...
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_391: * You think I'm gonna go easy on you, huh?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_439: * Ah, so you wanna get serious, do ya...?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_440: * Then tell me first, can you hear it?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_441: * Can you hear its song, singing from the deep...?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_871: * Geheheh... well, you gave it your best shot!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_909: * I saw the fire in your eyes... that's proof enough for me.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_910: * Take it. And this crystal, too.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_929: * You're gonna need something to give me...
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_933: * You've got guts, kid! I like that!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_982: * You aren't giving up, are ya?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_984: * Hell no! Kris, let's try again!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_100: * It's all right, it's all right.
* How 'bout you give it another shot?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_114: * Wahahahahaha!! That was the most fun I ever had!
* See how I used my healing just now!?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_117: * Guess this is mine now, huh.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_120: * Dammit Kris, the hell did you get so much stupid stuff?!
* Geh ha ha ha! Well, that Axe ain't going anywhere...
* ... So just pick it up later!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_124: * For some reason, I found this weird piece-a glass in my desk.
* Felt like someone really wanted me to use this thing.
* But it didn't interest me, so you can take it.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_125: * (ShadowCrystal was added to your KEY ITEMS.)
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_127: * The truth is, I was gonna give you it all if you beat me or not.
* But woomph, you actually put up quite a fight!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_129: * Well, maybe you're losing your touch.
* ... You weren't truly fighting by yourself, were ya?
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_130: * Guess I kinda needed their help to win.
* Well, don't sell your own skills short either.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_131: * Now go enjoy that Axe! Geh heh heh!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_138: * Knew it was worth having a rematch!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_139: * Was starting to wonder if I'd ever win...
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_140: * Perseverance. Each time, you get a little better.
* ... that's all I wanted to see.
* Can't think I'm gonna be the toughest thing you'll face.
* But next time, you'll be ready.
* Don't give up, and give 'em hell!
* Don't have to tell me that, old man!!
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_151: * Well, I'll be seeing you around now.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_158: * Why'd you... help me so much?
* You remind me a bit of someone I used to know.
* Just a character from that old story...
* ... Lord of the Hammer, huh. Hell if I'm reading that.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_159: * Isn't that... what Dragon Blazers was based on?
* Yep, yep. And so they changed parts of the story.
* Of course, the biggest fans got mad... but, isn't it interesting?
* The book was already just an interpretation of something else.
* Stories can be retold. They can be changed... That's what I believe.
obj_dw_church_arena_slash_Step_0_gml_160: * The words on a wall called you a hero.

* What?
* It's ALWAYS been us!?

* Beats me...
* This doesn't make any sense!!
* What about you guys!? You came to this room...

* Huh!? Are ya!? Are ya!?
* What about you!? You came to this room...
* Are YOU Mike?! Are you!?
* Ahhhh, I give up! As long as someone's Mike, it'll work out!
* Ahhhh, I give up! It's time to face the music.

* Dude, we gave him away. He's not even in this Dark World anymore.
* H-huh!? You mean... We... We...
* We can keep pretendin's to be Mike as long as we's want!?

obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0:
* See you again...
* Or not.
* Ha ha ha ha...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_460_0_b: * Ah, I know what you're going to say. Now, now, there's no shame in it.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_461_0_b: * You fought the Knight, didn't you? Well, we all know there's no winning there...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_462_0: * ... what!? You GOT the Shadow Crystal!?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_467_0: * ... I see, so you were able to recover the Shadow Mantle.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_468_0: * That's odd. Kris... where did you find it?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_471_0: * ... And without even using the Shadow Mantle!?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_472_0_b: * Hee hee... You three! You might be even sicker than that old clown!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_473_0_b: * Oh, it must've been a terrific match! If only I could've witnessed it...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_477_0_b: * ... Well, never mind that! You got the Crystal, that's all that matters!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_478_0_b: * Now you've got three. Only two more, and we should have enough...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_479_0_b: * ... to make something I think you'll quite enjoy. Now good luck... and I'll be taking that Shadow Crystal.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_486_0_b: * It's strange. By all reasonable means, the strength of your next opponent...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_487_0: * Should be enough to already ring the bell on your defeat.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_488_0: * But, for some reason... I can't help but think you may win.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_489_0: * What is this feeling? ... Hope? Hahaha! Whatever it is, it's quite funny!
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_498_0: * Ah, I know what you're going to say. Now, now, there's no shame in it.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_499_0: * You fought the Knight, didn't you? Well, we all know there's no winning there...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_503_0_b: * Even with the SHADOW MANTLE, you might have had a chance...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_504_0_b: * But even then, getting the SHADOW CRYSTAL would be... challenging.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_507_0_b: * If only you had the SHADOW MANTLE, your luck might have gone another way.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_508_0: * But, it's over now, isn't it? No mantle, no crystal.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_511_0: * Don't have a long face, now. We all knew nothing would come of this.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_512_0: * But it was fun... to pretend it might, for a little while.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_515_0: * What!? Is that... a Shadow Crystal!?
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_529_0: * I've got a funny story. You see, the Addisons wanted to buy out my store.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_530_0: * So I bet them for it on a game of cards.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_531_0: * Hand after hand, they lost and lost, stubbornly doubling their bet each time.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_532_0: * After a while, they'd lost their store, their money, and even some of their clothes...
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_534_0: * Of course, in the end, I laughed and gave it all back.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_535_0: * But it was fun to give them a little scare.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_536_0: * ... Although, not as fun as if they could actually win.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_540_0: * ... It's funny you insist on hanging around here.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_541_0: * I won't sell nor say anything new, I'm afraid.
obj_shop1_slash_Draw_0_gml_542_0: * I'll brew a cup of tea and get out the blankets, but leave when you please.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_73_0:
* Welcome to my
shop, you
ungrateful worms.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_244_0:
That seems
to be all,
no?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_308_0:
I shall
make use
of this!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_353_0: * See thou in the Dungeon, Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_354_0: * Come by any time, my good Worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_358_0: * I amst the Duke of Puzzles, Rouxls Kaard.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_359_0: * My hobbies includest calligraphy, lawkeeping, bugkeeping, cages...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_360_0: * ... and long walks in the dungeon.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_361_0: * Artest thou one of my admirers, worm?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_364_0: * By the way, no hard feelingst about earlier, right?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_371_0: * Hahaha!! So I might amasseth funds, Worms! An army of funds...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_372_0: * So that I may crushest thou like Fermented Grapes, into a most delicious and adult beverage -
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_378_0: * Haha, why of course I wouldst sell to my compatriarts, the Heroes Of Legend!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_379_0: * Earlier art but a Test of your Heroick Resolve!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_380_0: * Rouxls is ALWAYS on the winning side!! Thou can bet on that!!!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_386_0: * Our Lorde King art a cruel and terrifying Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_387_0: * However, he is also Brilliant, for he decidedesteth to appoinst ME, as Duke of Puzzles,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_388_0: * After pretty mucheth everyone else was firedst or placed inside a cage.
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_392_0: * Yes, the King! A terrible Man! An awful Monarcke!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_394_0: * I just envisionethed, perhaps... If I acceptedst this High Ranking Positione...
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_395_0: * I could assist to overthroweth him from the Inside!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_396_0: * ... What!? Cannot thou conceiveth of my plan?!?
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_402_0: * His Son, on the other hand, is more troublesome than a fistful of fleas!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_403_0: * He alwayst asks me the Worste Queries,
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_405_0: * Our relation is NONE, you little water-beetle! I placate you for your Father's sake!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_406_0: * I do not Wisheth to hear your MP3's! I would rather listen to the sweet song of Death!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_413_0: * Perhaps my wording art a bit Harshe earlier... The King's offspring is a Darling!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_415_0: * When his Father does not cook, his Son yells like a baby bird, until I feed him worms!
obj_shop2_slash_Draw_0_gml_416_0: * Is this what it means to be High Ranking!?

*Don't forget to
  buy something!
\m1  If you want!
\m2  Can I buy
  something too?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_174_:
*Welcome to...
\m3  The Music Room!
\m2  We don't sell
  anything!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_532_:
*Nice town, chief.
\m1  I think we're gonna like it
  here!
\m2  Cool city.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_533_:
*As thanks, you can listen to
  all sorts of songs here.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_534_:
*Don't think it'll be cheap,
  though!
\m2  It's free.
\m3  What!?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_546_:
*I'm Sweet.
\m3  The ladies call me Cap'n!
\m2  K_K!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_547_:
*We used to work the sound in
  this town.
\m3  ... until Queen came around.
\m2  (K_K is short for Cakes.)
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_548_:
*She made music against the law.
\m2  Unless you make a song she likes.
\m3  But the only JUNK she enjoys...
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_549_:
*Are reverse diss-tracks, where
  the vocalist puts themselves
  down, and praises Queen...
\m3  Or noise music.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_550_:
*But even if Queenie tries to put
  a limiter on us...
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_551_:
*You can't STOP ! THE ! MUSIC!
\m3  Hear that!? We'll just go
  underground!!
\m2  Crash! Boom! Bang!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_552_:
*That's why we made this junk
  shop!
\m3  We'll fund our musical rebellion!
\m2  Can we make noise music, too?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_565_:
*What, wanna see what we got!?
\m3  Yo, yo, can you handle this!?
\m2  Hold onto your antennas!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_571_:
*Queen wasn't always so... harsh.
\m3  No, she WAS! She just got WORSE
  somehow!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_572_:
*It wasn't 'til that DARK FOUNTAIN
  showed up,
\m3  That she started going into
  overdrive.
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_573_:
*"Knight" this, "Knight" that,
  "Fountain" that...
\m3  Like, what does that Knight
  even have going for it that I
  don't!? C'mon!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_574_:
*But like I said. She wasn't
  ALWAYS so bad. She used to
  give me sweets. For being so
  sweet!
\m3  H... huh!? I never got candy!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_575_:
*You kept calling her a
  "hot mama," Cap.
\m3  Yeah!? Is that wrong!? She
  looks like a mom and tends to
  overheat!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_576_:
*K_K! Help me out here!!
\m1  K_K! What do you think?
\m2  Huh? Me?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_578_:
*Yeah, you're right, K_K! We gotta
  focus on what's important!
\m3  If the band fights, we'll get
  outta tune!
\m2  Anyone have any lemon drops?
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_584_:
*Our main gig is making scrap
  into machines.
\m3  Our clients are sometimes a
  bit off-key though.
\m2  They smell off-key too!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_585_:
*Like some... little weird guy.
\m3  He wanted us to sneak into
  Queen's mansion...
\m2  We're just rebels, we don't
  wanna get in trouble!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_586_:
*But recently we got a
  real-high-class-client.
\m3  A man of TASTE! He had a way
  with words!!
\m2  I couldn't even understand him!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_587_:
*Now, all we gotta do is follow
  the blueprints, right?
\m3  It'll be our big time break!!
\m2  Yeah!! Haha!! It's gonna break
  apart!! Big time!!
obj_shop_ch2_music_slash_Draw_0_gml_616_:
*Yo, how was that!?
\m1  Did you get rocked?!
\m2  All our songs are only 4 seconds
  long!!

* (You unhesitatingly devoured the box of heart shaped candies.)
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_15: * (You accept this destruction as part of life...)
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_21: * For some strange reason, for just a brief moment...
* You thought you saw Noelle close against you, whispering.
* You put the glass to your ear...
* ... of course, that didn't do anything...
scr_litemuseb_slash_scr_litemuseb_gml_39: * (Everybody seems too busy to pick up the phone...)
scr_prophecytext_slash_scr_prophecytext_: THE GIRL

THE PROPHECY, WHICH WHISPERS
AMONG THE SHADOWS.

THE LEGEND OF THIS WORLD.
<DELTARUNE.>

A WORLD BASKED IN PUREST LIGHT.
BENEATH IT, GREW ETERNAL NIGHT.

IF FOUNTAINS FREED, THE ROARING CRIES.
AND TITANS SHAPE FROM DARKENED EYES.

THE LIGHT AND DARK, BOTH BURNING DIRE.
A COUNTDOWN TO THE EARTH'S EXPIRE.

BUT LO, ON HOPES AND DREAMS THEY SEND.
THREE HEROES AT THE WORLD'S END.
THE GIRL, WITH HOPE CROSSED ON HER HEART.

THE SECOND HERO.
THE GIRL, WITH HOPE CROSSED ON HER HEART.
THE PRINCE, ALONE IN DEEPEST DARK...

THE THIRD HERO.
THE PRINCE, ALONE IN DEEPEST DARK
THE CAGE, WITH HUMAN SOUL AND PARTS!

THE FIRST HERO.
THE CAGE, WITH HUMAN SOUL AND PARTS!
THEY'LL HEAR THE RING OF HEAVEN'S CALL.
THEY'LL SEE THE TAIL OF HELL TAKE CRAWL.

THE KNIGHT WHICH MAKES
WITH BLACKENED KNIFE.

SHALL DUEL WITH HEROES
STRIFE BY STRIFE.

THE QUEEN'S CHARIOT
CANNOT BE STOPPED.

THE LORD OF SCREENS
CLEAVED RED BY BLADE.

THE FLOWER MAN, 
TRAPPED IN ASYLUM.
JOCKINGTON GROWS THE BEARD.

THE POINTY-HEADED WILL SAY
"TOOTHPASTE," AND THEN  "BOY."
A CONUNDRUM'S FIRST FOUR TONES.
A CONUNDRUM'S LAST FOUR TONES.
A CONUNDRUM'S MULTITUDE TONES.

THE ANGEL, BANISHED, WILL
FINALLY MEET WITH ITS DESIRE.

AND THEN. WHEN ALL HOPE
IS LOST FOR THE TALE
THE FINAL TRAGEDY UNVEILS.

FOR TO SAVE THE WORLDS,
WE LAST OF ALL SAY,

ONLY THEN,
WILL THE WORLDS BE SAVED.

AXE CARVED BY THE
TORTOISE'S GRAND HAMMER.

AND LAST, WAS THE GIRL.
AT LAST, WAS THE GIRL.

COLDWATER FELL FROM THE
TOP OF THE SKY.
ROOTS
GALLERY
LOVE FINDS ITS WAY TO THE GIRL.

THE LAST PROPHECY.
THE STORY'S END.

TO SAVE THE WORLDS,
THERE IS ONLY ONE WAY.
scr_recruit_info_slash_scr_recruit_info_: Said to be someone's best friend, but maybe not. Shine on, you lazy diamond!
* Hey, boss! I'll have a Dark Candy Starfait!
A heart with a big heart. Always supporting others with her bullets.
* (Hathy is going to order a heart-foam latte.)
A simple organism that takes life one square at a time.
* (Looks like it wants to osmose some flavorful cubes.)
A real dust bunny. Known to play dirty, but loves to play clean.
* (Looks like it wants to be dabbed with rubbing alcohol.)
A shape changing fighter. Ironically, blocking is not its forte.
* Everything tastes better with a normally-shaped body!
It cries tears of joy that you are its boss.
An agent of CHAOS, he became DEVILSKNIFE to the pocket.
Obsessed with ranger shows, it lets everyone know it's better than Rudinn.
* Boss...? You're treating me...? Oh, you shouldn't have! (smile)
Although stronger than Hathy, seems to have fewer friends.
* (Head Hathy drinks an ice tea in silence...)
An aggressive antivirus. It's not down with the sickness.
* Pipooo! Nothing beats a nice shot of espresso... Want me to give you a "shot", too!?
Known to say ASOBOH, which means "Let's Play!" ... does it know that?
It was controlled by Queen. But, it's stronger and cooler now, so?
* (It has some kind of energy drink.)
It dreams of re-enacting scenes from cat and mouse cartoons.
A virus with a slightly criminal streak... and a heart of gold.
* Wanna share my soda? We'll both get sick that way... Hee hee.
Colorful and dandy, you can always count on him to work hard.
* Boss? Shall we sit down and enjoy a nice earl grey?
It absorbed the wire with fighting spirit. Gets flustered easily.
* (... it's crushing its energy drink with its hand...)
Loves to coordinate outfits. Strongly dislikes clowns.
You recruited 3 big mice and you're stuck with it.
* (It's getting electricity from the melted cheese like a water wheel)
Passionate about music, but often taken advantage of by sinister types.
* (Seems to just be enjoying the musical ambience.)
Don't scream...! It's not the real monster, just the Darkner. Ooo la la.
* Shush! Don't do the move... I am photographing the drink!
A bouncer that favors brute force over beauty. Gets lost easily.
* Say da word, boss... I'll give dis drink a sip it won't forget.
A real dust... frog. Known to play dirty, but loves to play... dirty.
* (Looks like it want to be dabbed with rubbing alcohol.)
The chatty office star. Obviously quite a looker despite her prudish wear.

* (Seems like they're drinking water.)
* (... feels questionable.)
A sly customer that takes risk until luck strikes. ... cheating also works.
* This drink's not mine? It's fine. I'm just keeping it warm.
The weather girl who really "makes it rain." Like... with water, though.
* Oh no, where's Lanino? He better not be having a team relationship...
A charming weatherman who can control the weather. Which, seems like cheating.
* Haven't been on a date alone for a while! ... which, isn't a date.
A waxy spirit that generates ghastly flames. Though, not a "real" ghost per se, it has an aversion to whips, water, and the like.
* (Guei is sipping the melted wax from the ambient candles.)
An ancient aromancer, it generates magic incense and stores it in its steel shell. Easygoing, it gets along well with Guei.
* (It's drinking nothing but straight tea powder.)
An old sage who can't help but mumble. It is rumored that 1000 spells are kept within his beard.
The aqua fairy which slumbers in the "Water Cooler". Arbitrarily does fairy-like or princess-like things (as she pleases).
* Oh, is this tapwater? Ho hum...
The witch's familiar, a living sword. Its greatest delight is being asked to carve graffiti.
* (It's carved your initials in the table...)
A witch who engages in musical rituals. Each song she plays is a magical charm that can change one's mood... though, isn't that all music?
* (She's musically striking the side of the cup with a spoon.)
A philosopher who studies the ancient words. Their light-blocking mask is said to let them commune deeper with the truth of the dark.
* Am I 1`% tea, or has it become 99`% me?
A regular "Mizzle" who, after ages of worship, falsely believes herself to be of great royalty. Isn't even "HOLY" elemental.
* Oh, young hero. I beseeth thee; where is the VIP Chamber?

scr_spelltext_slash_scr_spelltext_gml_33:
* ~1 cast PACIFY!
* But the enemy wasn't \cBTIRED\cW...
scr_spelltext_slash_scr_spelltext_gml_36:
* ~1 cast PACIFY!
* But the foe wasn't \cBTIRED\cW... try \cYSPARING\cW!
scr_spelltext_slash_scr_spelltext_gml_58: * ~1 and Susie cast DUAL HEAL! Effectiveness of DUAL HEAL has lowered!
scr_spelltext_slash_scr_spelltext_gml_91: * But, it was not something that can understand MERCY.
scr_spelltext_slash_scr_spelltext_gml_26:
* ~1 used the TENSIONBIT!
* Tension raised up earlier.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_12_0: * You really didn't want to throw it away.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_19_0:
* You took it from your pocket.
* You have a \cYvery, very, bad feeling\c0 about throwing it away.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_20_0: * Hand shaking, you dropped the ball of junk on the ground.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_34_0: * You felt a feeling of relief.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_39_0:
* Hey, Kris! What's up?
* Didja lose your pencil again?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_40_0: * Here, you want the candy-cane one or the one with lights on it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_41_0:
* Huh?
* You want to be partners?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_42_0:
* Ummm... Sorry...
* Berdly already asked me...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_43_0: * But I could ask Ms. Alphys if we could make a group of 3!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_44_0:
* I'll ask if you're sure!
 
Not yet     Yes. Ask.\C1
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_52_0:
* Miss Alphys!
* Umm, is it OK if we have a group of 3?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_57_0: * Yeah, I'm sure there's someone else you can ask!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_62_0:
* Do you wanna be partners?
Not yet     Yes\C1
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_70_0:
* Miss Alphys!
* Umm, is it OK if we have a group of 3?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_75_0:
* Umm, OK.
* You just keep doing your thing, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_80_0:
* Alright.
* Let's get this over with.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_81_0:
* We'll get more chalk.
* Mosey back to class.
* And then, Kris...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_129_0:
* Welcome.
* I am the \cYPrince\cW of this \cYKingdom\cW...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_131_0:
* Kris, Susie...
* There is a \cYLEGEND\cW in this land.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_132_0: * A LEGEND that one day, two \cYHEROES of LIGHT\cW will arrive,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_133_0: * And fulfill the ancient prophecy, foretold by time and space.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_134_0:
* Please, Heroes...
* Listen to my tale...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_151_0:
* Umm, r-really?
* Are you sure?
* It's fairly important.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_152_0: * And... um, in my opinion, it's a really nice \cYPROPHECY\cW!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_153_0: * I think you'd quite like it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_170_0: * Oh... Perhaps I shouldn't have rehearsed it so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_172_0: * Look, dude, we didn't come here for a bedtime story.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_173_0: * Just tell us how to get home.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_175_0: * Ummm, the easiest way would be to seal the \cYEastern FOUNTAIN\cW.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_178_0: * You mean, uh, like the water bubbler or something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_180_0:
* THE fountain.
* That which gives the \cYDARK WORLD\cW form.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_181_0: * ... umm, are you sure you actually know the legend?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_186_0: * But I think I've got enough info.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_189_0:
* W-wait!
* Let me at least tell you how to...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_200_0: * This is the CASTLE TOWN^2, where my subjects reside...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_201_0: * Err, well, they would if I had any...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_202_0_b: * Oh, don't worry about me, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_203_0: * I'm certain I'll find a subject someday...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_214_0: * Why, Kris, you don't have to do that...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_216_0: * Kris, as your Prince and authority, I order you to...!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_217_0: * Please let me know what to do!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_224_0:
* Oh, thank you, Kris^2!
* I will!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_232_0: * Er, Kris, you know you can hold [~1] to run...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_242_0:
* Really?
* And yet you choose not to...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_243_0: * Right, who knows how long these leisurely days will last...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_244_0: * There's nothing wrong with taking your time, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_250_0:
* Right!
* You'll move faster by holding [~1]!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_251_0: * And I'll be right behind you, so don't worry!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_252_0: * ... Unless you want to get away, in which case, sorry.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_265_0: * ... You can skip text by pressing [~1]?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_274_0: * Listening to me talk, because you wanted to?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_275_0: * I'll try to make it worth your while, Kris!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_280_0: * Right! In the case you read very quickly.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_281_0: * Or you're tired of what's being said.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_282_0: * ... No need to skip my text, right, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_293_0:
* Oh, Kris!
* It's the training dummy I made!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_294_0: * Now seems like a great chance to prepare for the enemy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_295_0: * Would you like me to teach you how to fight?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_308_0: * Right, you already fought Lancer, didn't you...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_309_0: * I was so excited to teach you, I absolutely blanked!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_310_0:
* ... B-but, um...
* Just in case you forgot anything...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_311_0:
* Here!
* I made a Manual for you and Susie!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_314_0_b: * Press [~1] to open the menu and use it in your ITEMS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_323_0:
* Oh my^2!
* The Great Door is opened?!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_324_0: * No wonder Lancer was able to come through...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_326_0: * Kris, once we pass through this door...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_328_0: * A journey foretold exactly by the prophecy...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_329_0: * But, Kris, I believe YOUR choices are important, too.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_330_0: * This world is full of all kinds of people, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_331_0: * In the end, how we treat them makes all the difference.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_332_0: * So let's try our best to get by without FIGHTing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_333_0: * If we can manage to do that...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_334_0: * I believe this tale may have a happy ending.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_336_0: * ... you may not... find the result favorable.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_337_0: * ... Oh, I'm sorry! Is that too much to ask?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_343_0: * Kris, I knew you were a hero the moment I saw you.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_349_0: * Kris, in the end, what you choose is up to you.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_350_0: * As long as you're happy with it, I'm happy too.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_351_0: * So just try your best, and don't worry!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_364_0: * (There are two objects hanging from the tree.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_370_0: * (There's a candy hanging from the tree.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_377_0: * (There's nothing hanging low enough to take.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_399_0: * (You decided to let the tree keep it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_410_0: * (There are two objects hanging from the tree.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_416_0: * (There's a candy hanging from the tree.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_423_0: * (There's nothing hanging low enough to take.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_445_0: * (You decided to let the tree keep it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_456_0: * (The remains of the cake are still smoldering...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_462_0: * (The remains of the cake are still smoldering...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_473_0: * (The Broken Cake was added to your \cYKEY ITEMS\cW.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_484_0: * (You decided putting cake in your pockets is a bad idea.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_496_0: * Alright, everyone's put in their entries!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_498_0: * Since you look like you don't care.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_508_0: * (You take the crumpled up piece of paper.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_513_0: * I don't think I'm allowed to say this one.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_517_0: * Woah, I'm not allowed to say Tier-TWO swear words!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_518_0: * Wow. You three's collective dad must be very cool.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_520_0: * Er, could we PERHAPS consider a DIFFERENT name?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_522_0: * Ralsei, you don't HAVE to be in our Squad.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_524_0: * Yeah! How about I be in the Squad and YOU be the bad guy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_526_0: * Tell him he has a new son.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_527_0: * One that has to take a shower every time he reads a swear word.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_529_0:
* OK, fine!
* We can keep the name!
* I just won't say it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_532_0:
* See ya, losers!
* It's shower time!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_540_0: * (You take the paper with "LANCER" written on the outside.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_544_0:
* Wow, who did that one?
* It's really good!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_546_0: * Wait, why do YOU get to choose the name?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_550_0:
* Yeah!
* It doesn't matter who MAY have written it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_551_0: * Regardless, LANCER's going to meet absolute doom!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_554_0: * I know! Let's call it the LANCER FAN CLUB for short!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_563_0: * (You take the neatly folded piece of paper.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_566_0: * "The Legendary Heroes: The Herald of Fun and Friendship"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_569_0: * See, I think it's the perfect name...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_570_0: * Because we're all friends: That like to have a lot of fun.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_572_0: * Okay, first... jeez, that's a mouthful, dude.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_573_0: * Second, what are our enemies gonna think?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_574_0: * That we're gonna be BUDDIES with 'em?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_575_0: * Let's change it to something SHORT! INTIMIDATING!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_583_0: * Ya know, just, uh, concentrating on the "Fun" part.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_587_0: * I've got to osmose my afternoon milk!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_600_0: * Well jingle my goshdarn bells! Looks like Krismas came early!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_601_0: * Alright, Kris. Just gimme the straight shot.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_602_0:
* Why you here?
* Did your mom make you come here?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_612_0: * Hey, Kris, you wanna chat or something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_613_0: * Don't worry, there's no way you can bore me right now!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_619_0:
* Hahaha, that's what I thought!
* She's a PEACH, huh...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_620_0: * Fuzzy n' sweet on the outside, a total NUT on the inside!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_621_0: * Oh, your dad? Yeah, he's a real fruit himself too.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_622_0: * Which one? I dunno, probably a hairy one... like a kiwi.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_626_0: * Okay, okay, seriously, you wanna chat or something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_630_0:
* Really?
* You've grown up a lot, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_632_0: * Wasn't too long ago you were just the creepy kid next door.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_633_0: * Now you're the creepy kid right in front of me!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_635_0: * Okay, okay, seriously, you wanna chat or something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_646_0: * She's a sweetheart, isn't she, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_647_0: * Smart, kind, sweet... couldn't ask for a better daughter.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_648_0: * I just wish she wasn't so... defenseless.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_649_0: * Scary movies, bugs, Santa Claus... everything scares her.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_650_0: * And when it happens, she freezes like a deer in headlights.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_651_0: * Remember she used to even be afraid of humans under the bed?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_652_0: * (Kris, it was NOT nice of you to hide under there, by the way!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_653_0: * ... anyhow, that's what's tough about being in here, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_654_0: * Not what's going on with me.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_655_0: * Just that... in the meantime, I can't be there to protect her.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_656_0: * Keep an eye out for her, OK?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_660_0: * Kris, even if we've grown apart, we still love your family.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_661_0: * After all, me and Asgore were college pals, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_662_0: * Oh hey... now that Asriel's off to college...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_663_0: * Y'think he's doing any CRAZY parties, like me and your dad?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_664_0: * Heh, I'm just pulling your leg. Your dad was no party animal.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_665_0: * Your MOTHER on the other hand...! Whoo!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_666_0: * She'd alway fuss about going, but once the party started...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_668_0: * Once she hit me clear across the room with a key lime pie!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_669_0: * I got smashed into the snack table and toppled everything!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_674_0: * ... So, why am I in here...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_675_0: * Well, they found some crap, so it's just some tests.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_676_0: * Yeah, it's no big deal. Nothing a Holiday can't handle.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_677_0: * I'll be outta here in a jiff, then I can go back to, I dunno...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_678_0: * Yelling at you for getting tangled in our light display.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_683_0: * Then what the hell're you here for, Kris!? To gawk!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_684_0: * You thought this was the zoo or something!? C'mon!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_690_0:
No No No
No No No
No No No
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_700_0:
* Teen'z Corner
Monthly Toon Review:
Mew Mew Kissy Cutie 2
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_701_0: * This reviewer had Mew Mew 2 as her first exposure to the series...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_702_0: * And let her tell you, it makes Mew Mew 1 look like a dumpster with sparkly cat ears!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_703_0: * With a darker storyline and more mature themes...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_704_0: * The second one treats the viewer like a real adult...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_705_0: * Instead of like an animal that will die if it goes ten seconds without seeing a beach ball.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_706_0: * Not to mention, Mew Mew's character in the first one...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_707_0: * Is more stale than the ramen I eat at home by myself with the lights off.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_708_0: * Teens and older should check out this dark masterpiece!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_719_0: * "Throughout my career, some of my best ideas came from dreams."
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_720_0: * "Take a rest here. If anyone asks -- you're writing!"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_744_0:
* (It's a metal picnic table.)

* (Cigarette butts lay on the ground underneath it.)

* (Your fingers don't fit through the top anymore.)
* (You try from below.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_758_0: * (... your hand became covered in cobwebs.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_764_0: * (You decided not to stick your fingers through.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_775_0:
* Hey... there...
* Noticed you were...
* Here...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_776_0:
* It's me!
* You know ME, right?
* Of course you do!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_779_0:
* But it's OK, y'hear!
* Because you're y'here!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_795_0:
* Oh! Oh!
* I'm so happy, y'hear!?
* I'm so happy I... I...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_796_0:
* I don't know what to do!
* I don't remember being this happy before!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_818_0:
* Kris! That's you!
* That's a real nice name for a friend!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_823_0:
* H... Hippa... Hyper... Hoper...
* Um, Hippopotamus! That's you!
* Big name, but it's worth it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_826_0:
* Oh, excuse me!
* I forgot to introduce myself!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_828_0: * ... Actually, since no one talks to me, I forgot my own name...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_831_0:
* ~1!
* Can you give me a name...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_841_0:
* Hmmm! It's perfect, y'hear!
* I don't know what it means, but it's perfect!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_842_0:
* Hmm!!
* Feels like it's shaped like me!
* Feels like it smells like me!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_843_0:
* Wait, what was the name?
* U... Umyum? Yeah! It's perfect!
* Umyum, that's my name.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_850_0: * Feels like my self-esteem's in full bloom! Feels like my head's about to flower!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_851_0:
* Wait, what was the name?
* B... Bootis? Yeah! Perfect!
* The taste, the smell, the...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_858_0:
* Asriel II... Mmm...
* Sounds... familiar.
* It feels like... a memory!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_859_0:
* It feels like that good boy...
* That threw those good corn flakes in the water for me.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_860_0:
* Wait, what was the name?
* C... Cereal? Yeah! I love Cereal! Bathe me in flakes!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_870_0:
* Thank you for giving me a name!
* I'll cherish it, y'hear!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_872_0:
* K... Krismas?
* That's your name, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_873_0:
* Um, H... Hippa... um...
* Hyper Potato Mask.
* That's your name, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_874_0: * I wanna tell you... something... tomorrow...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_875_0: * Somethin' I can only tell a friend...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_886_0: * (It's a rusty fridge with some photos on it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_889_0: * ... help yourself to anything you want.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_895_0: * (It's a rusty fridge with some photos on it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_908_0: * (There are two Eggs inside the fridge.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_913_0: * (All that's inside is a jar with a single pickle in it...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_914_0: * (... and, for some reason, a lone egg.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_920_0: * (All that's inside is a jar with a single pickle in it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_925_0: * (All that's inside is a jar with a single pickle in it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_927_0: * (You put the Egg you were carrying inside, too...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_948_0: * (A photo of your mother and father on their wedding day.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_949_0: * (She's holding a bouquet of seven flowers.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_950_0: * (A reindeer-looking monster stands nearby in a tuxedo.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_962_0:
* Lil Krissy!!!
* Like, what's up!?
* Give Aunt Catty a hug!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_964_0:
* Ha ha ha!
* I'm not even actually your aunt!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_965_0:
* Oh my god...
* Can I talk to you about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_967_0:
* Actually, like, anything, though.
* Your choice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_971_0:
* Lil Krissy!
* Did you wanna talk about something!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_980_0:
* Oh my god, Asriel!
* Like, what a cutie pie!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_981_0: * Do you remember when me and him went to the dance?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_982_0:
* That was like...
* The best night EVER!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_983_0: * Even though I spilled the entire punch bowl all over him...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_984_0: * And danced inappropriately in front of your mom...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_985_0: * And got arrested in the parking lot for making a scene...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_986_0:
* Hahaha! That was SO much fun!
* Tell him I said hi!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_990_0: * Like, that green girl next door?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_991_0:
* Oh my god, Krissy.
* She's like... my LIFE VILLAIN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_992_0: * Like, the other day, I went to see Cat Petters 2...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_993_0: * And the only other person in the theater was her!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_994_0: * Then I went to QC's and ordered a Catpuccino...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_995_0: * And she, like, was already drinking one!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_996_0:
* She's SUCH a copycat!
* ... uhh, copygator?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1001_0:
* Ooo, how's Catti doing?
* I have no idea.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1002_0: * We, like, totally can't connect at all!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1003_0: * Yesterday, I asked if she wanted to hear me play the ukelele...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1004_0:
* She said no!
* And then she, like, told me...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1005_0: * My playing is "an anti-blessing from Planet Hell."
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1007_0:
* That's SOOO cute!
* I love my fricked-up lil sis!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1011_0:
* Oh, you gotta go?
* Do you have, like, homework...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1012_0: * You should, like, let me help!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1013_0:
* Hahaha, JK!
* I totally don't want to! Laters!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1022_0:
* Krissy!
* Like, long time no see!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1023_0:
* What's up?
* Did you wanna talk about something?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1030_0: * Ugh, that chick next door drives me NUTS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1031_0:
* I keep seeing her EVERYWHERE I go.
* She's a TOTAL copycat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1032_0:
* Like, WHY though?
* Doesn't she realize she'll NEVER be me?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1033_0: * Honestly, her whole family is, like, SO trashy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1034_0: * Once her sister served me a coffee and I swear it was half cat fur.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1035_0: * Like, get a hairnet, girl. For, like, your whole body.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1040_0: * Remember that time you wanted to hang out with us big kids?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1041_0: * I was like, "yeah, of course! Just get us some burgers!"
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1042_0:
* Then, like, amazingly...
* You ACTUALLY got them...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1043_0: * So I told you to go back and get some french fries, too...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1045_0: * They were SO good, I ate like six!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1046_0:
* Then I like...
* Suddenly got so sick I had to go home.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1048_0:
* So, like, anyway...
* Kris, are you busy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1053_0: * Aww, that's no way to talk to your almost-sister-in-law.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1055_0: * Remember that time I played truth or dare with Azzy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1056_0: * I, like, made him give me his first kiss...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1057_0: * Then your mom found out he kissed someone, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1058_0: * Like, I think she basically dialed 911.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1059_0: * I swear your family went to church, like...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1064_0: * Aw, Krissy, you just wanted to say hi?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1065_0:
* That's adorable...
* Now get out of here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1098_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1102_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1111_0:
* HA! HA! Did I say FIFTY!?
* Well, we just went on sale!
* TWENTY! TWENTY Dark Dollars!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1138_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1142_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1151_0:
* ONE!!! ONLY ONE DOLLAR!!!
* PLEASE!!! PLEASE!!!
* I NEED THIS RIGHT NOW!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1174_0:
* Heheh...
* Just hand over the money, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1178_0:
* You're just like us.
* An' people like us gotta help each other out.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1188_0:
* Er, excuse me, Sir.
* I think I have a dollar.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1194_0:
* Heheh, perfect!
* Right this way, gentleners!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1207_0:
* I'm TP Master.
* Ask me about TP's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1215_0:
* TP? What's TP?
* That's what lets you cast SPELLS, see!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1216_0:
* When you see that orange bar,
* Cast some SPELLS when it's filled up far.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1217_0:
* TP...! It's quite a caper!
* TP! Stands for...
* ... Toilet Paper!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1219_0: * ... no, it stands for Tension Points.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1225_0:
* TP only lasts, inside a fight.
* Once you win, it's out of sight.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1226_0:
* Having extra, feels unbearable.
* No point in saving, it's straight-up terrible.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1228_0: * But leftover TP turns into extra money at the end of battle...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1230_0: * You mean I only should have been using one square!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1234_0:
* You get TP when you DEFEND.
* Protect yourself, then cast SPELLs, friend.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1235_0: * You also get TP by getting close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1236_0: * Look for the heart outline when you get close to bullets.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1256_0:
* I'm Ralsei Master.
* Ask me about RALSEI's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1264_0:
* Ralsei's spell's called PACIFY.
* Use it on BABIES, before they CRY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1266_0: * What? It safely removes a "TIRED" enemy from combat.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1268_0: * What if you're fighting a BABY!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1273_0: * Ralsei has a spell that HEALS, dude.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1274_0: * Why use that, when you can eat FOOD?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1276_0: * Because you won't have to use up an ITEM?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1278_0: * I could have avoided all those empty calories!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1282_0: * Ralsei loves when you give us MONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1283_0: * He will hug you, and call you HONEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1286_0: * You don't need money to get me to do that!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1295_0:
* I'm Susie Master.
* Ask me about SUSIE's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1303_0:
* When KRIS uses WARNING, SUSIE can't hit.
* So make sure to -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1305_0: * So there's no reason to use it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1307_0:
* Unless...
* Unless you wanted not to hurt -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1313_0: * Susie's gone, I'm afraid, I'm afreet.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1318_0: * The days of WARNing, have long since past.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1326_0: * Susie always attacks, the foe on top.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1327_0: * She'll smash them, with a crushing chop.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1328_0: * She always strikes, at the first thing she sees...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1332_0:
* Oh no, oh no!
* She's looking at ME!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1337_0: * Will you two pick up the slack?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1342_0: * Susie's BUSTER, RUDE as may be...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1343_0: * Will deal more damage, if you just press [~1]!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1349_0:
* Susie loves, when you give us MONEY.
* She will -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1357_0: * Will you two pick up the slackts?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1361_0: * SUSIE seems to have changed, just a hair.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1362_0: * That kind of growth is actually rare.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1378_0:
* I'm Kris Master.
* Ask me about KRIS's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1386_0: * When HP goes negative, your friends fall down
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1387_0: * But bringing them back, is easy-town
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1388_0: * Plain foods and spells, work like a charm -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1389_0: * And with a MINT, you can cure all HARM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1391_0: * Even normal items and spells can revive people, huh?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1398_0: * If you only ACT, you might start to think -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1399_0: * What about the guy with the scarf in pink?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1401_0: * If you know ACTing will make the enemy friendly -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1402_0: * Then you can ask me to SPARE on the SAME TURN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1403_0: * Or, cast PACIFY if you know they'll get TIRED.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1404_0: * If you plan ahead, a lot can happen in ONE TURN!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1406_0: * Hey, who's the MASTER here, me or you!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1410_0: * It's a good idea, to give us BUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1411_0: * It'll make you happy, and fill you with LUCKs.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1412_0: * Over there, is our DONATION HOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1413_0: * We had a BOX, but it got STOLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1423_0: * (If you like our tutorials, please throw your money into a hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1427_0: * (The hole is filled to the brim with cash.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1442_0: * (You failed to budget enough money to throw into a hole...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1447_0: * (You decided to save the dollar for a different hole.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1459_0:
* We, uh, got bored.
* So we're having a snack.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1463_0: * C'mon! All I ate for breakfast was chalk!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1467_0: * Sorry. What are you two having, exactly...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1469_0: * Just a daily treasure I hid in this stump's orifice.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1473_0: * Feast for yourself, my main man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1475_0: * Kris, do you want to, um, try it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1493_0:
* It's my secret stash.
* A little snackeroo from me to you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1498_0: * C'mon, you're just pretending to eat it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1500_0: * Haha, yeah! That's what I do, too!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1508_0: * (There was a honeypot of salsa inside the stump.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1522_0: * Look, if no one else will eat it, I'll try it!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1523_0:
* ... there's a jar of... Blood...?
* In here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1525_0:
* No, no.
* It's merely a pot of free-range salsa.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1527_0: * Thanks, that's actually more gross somehow.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1560_0: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1561_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1564_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_1565_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2603_0: * I wonder if Alphys would let us switch partners, I mean?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2605_0: * Gets to be, slammed into lockers, and stuff, anymore.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2606_0: * (Wait, I don't think I phrased that correctly...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2610_0:

* She was EATING the chalk???
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2612_0: * Wait! You're teasing me, aren't you, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2613_0: * L-like when you told me ICE-E was real and eats kids...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2614_0: * So Dess smacked you with a wiffle bat 'til you stopped lying.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2615_0: * ... Huh? You're telling the truth? Seriously?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2617_0: * Umm, then... what color chalk does she like?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2618_0: * And, do you think she likes the thin or the thick kind...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2619_0: * (Wait, maybe making her a lunchbox full of chalk is stupid...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2623_0: * Seriously, Kris? But I help you ALL the time!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2624_0: * The LEAST you can do is give me a LITTLE information!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2625_0: * Like, d-does she like metal music!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2626_0: * Is she really an obligate carnivore!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2627_0: * D... Does she really have a tail underneath her jacket!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2629_0: * Sorry Kris, it's not any of my business, is it...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2640_0: * (If you go to bed, this chapter of your adventures will end.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2665_0_b: * (If you go back to sleep, \cYyou may miss a lot of important things\cW.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2677_0: * (For some reason, you decided to go back to sleep...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2690_0: * BOO HOO, BOO HOO, UEE HEE HEE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2692_0: * BUT LO, THREE VISITORS STANDING INSIDE?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2695_0: * Nice to meet you! I'm Ralsei, this is Kris, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2697_0: * So, what the hell are you doing in there?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2699_0:
* I AM INNOCENT, INNOCENT.
* I JUST WANTED TO PLAY A GAME, GAME.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2700_0: * BUT THE BORING KINGS FOUND SUCH FUN TO BE A TROUBLE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2701_0: * AS PUNISHMENT, THEY CRAVED TO IMPRISON MY BODY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2702_0: * BUT I'M FAST, FAST, CLEVER, CLEVER.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2703_0: * THEY LOST THE CHASE, AND LOCKED UP THEIR ENTIRE RACE,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2704_0: * BUILDING A PRISON AROUND THE WHOLE WORLD. NOW I'M THE ONLY FREE ONE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2706_0: * Huh? Free? But you're clearly the one behind bars...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2708_0: * THINGS DON'T SEEM SUCH FROM HERE, LIGHTNERS!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2710_0: * Well, sounds like you don't need any help, then.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2712_0:
* THAT IS UN-SO.
* I GROW LONELY IN MY LITTLE FREEDOM.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2713_0: * SO, SHALL YOU PLAY A GAME WITH ME, ME...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2714_0: * I'LL SHOW YOU WHAT IT MEANS TO BE FREE!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2719_0: * FIND THE KEY, AND I'LL LET YOU BE FREE, FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2720_0: * THE KEY IS HIDDEN FROM THE EYES. THE OLD SHOPKEEPER KNOWS A SECRET.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2732_0: * FIND THE KEY, AND I'LL LET YOU BE FREE, FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2733_0: * THE KEY IS HIDDEN FROM THE EYES. THE OLD SHOPKEEPER KNOWS A SECRET.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2738_0: * BOO HOO, BOO HOO, UEE HEE HEE!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2739_0: * HOW CAN YOU REFUSE, WHEN YOU ARE ALREADY PLAYING...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2749_0: * UEE HEE HEE, THE KEY, THE KEY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2750_0: * A MARVELLOUS FUN IS ABOUT TO BREAK FREE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2766_0: * (You put the Door Key in front of the Door.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2771_0: * YOU CAME TOO FAR! YOUR CHOICE HAS RUN OUT!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2794_0: * Hey! You're the chumps that beat me up earlier!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2795_0: * There's no way I'll forgive you, so scram!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2807_0: * We're sorry, we made a mistake earlier.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2808_0: * We promise we won't do it again!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2810_0: * Huh...? You're apologizing? I guess I'll forgive you then...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2811_0: * (Your violence against a single Rudinn was forgiven!)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2823_0: * Heh, you wanna act that way, huh...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2824_0: * Forgive me or I'll crush you, dweeb!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2826_0: * I... I'm sorry!!! I forgive you!!! Here, take this Choco Diamond!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2832_0: * I'm sorry, but we don't have any room...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2834_0: * Too late, I already ate it.

* (Listen to the contents?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2867_0: * (Where will you ride the elevator to?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2977_0: * I know you wanna give a REAL goodbye to everyone, right?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2978_0: * I mean, I'm ALL for leaving right away, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2979_0: * Y'know, we could go back a sec. If you wanted.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2986_0: * Well, then what are we waiting for?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_2992_0: * Let's at least say goodbye to Lancer!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3002_0: * If you can beat me, I'll go back to being a good guy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3004_0: * YOU guys will have to become bad guys with US...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3007_0: * Ho ho ho!!! Our wish is your command!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3016_0: * We were just gonna thrash you anyway, so...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3036_0_b: * Kris, honey, you have grown up so much...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3037_0: * Someday soon you will be going off to university as well...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3040_0: * You asked when your horns were going to grow in?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3041_0: * So we bought that headband with the little red horns on it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3042_0: * Oh, you wore it for months! Whatever happened to it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3044_0: * Remember that video-game you and Asriel used to play?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3045_0: * What was it called...? Super Smashing Fighters?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3046_0: * When he was very little, he LOVED the green lizard from that.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3047_0: * We even had a birthday party for him themed around it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3048_0: * Your father painted all these eggs with spots as decoration...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3050_0: * Until the next day, your father cooked them all for breakfast.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3052_0: * Ever since, he's hated that book about eating green eggs!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3056_0: * Kris, since only you and I are living here right now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3057_0: * It feels... just a bit lonely, does it not...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3058_0: * But, fortunately, sharing a warm, freshly-made pie,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3059_0: * Is the perfect cure for such a condition.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3060_0: * ... as long as I get to eat some, of course.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3064_0: * Oh, Kris...? Flowers? For your mother...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3067_0: * These are from HIM, are they not.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3069_0: * Err, well, worry not, Kris, I will...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3078_0: * Kris, perhaps you should go to bed early tonight...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3079_0: * You do not look quite yourself.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3153_0: * My friend, share in my riches! I have many worse cakes I do not want!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3154_0: * If you're not carrying a Cake, come here and I'll give you one! Forever!

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3157_0: * Now, I'm going to continue to spin and cry! Spin and cry!

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3178_0: * Mom amiga! You want an inferior cake, my friend?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3192_0: * Mama shiba! You're carrying too many things that aren't cakes!

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3253_0: * A limit. To the advice I'm qualified for.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3299_0: * Just gonna do some crimes and go to... jail.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3366_0: * What? Live in a kingdom ruled by YOU?

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3370_0: * My giant hamster wheel is getting cold.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3387_0: * Perish In The Chill Of Absolute Destruction

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3415_0: * Little buddy! You aren't gonna BELIEVE this!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3417_0: * Asriel!! You've GOT to tell Asriel RIGHT NOW!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3418_0: * He's gonna be so proud of me!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3420_0: * Ah, Little BUDDY. How do I PUT it...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3421_0: * I... don't actually know!! I haven't met her in real life!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3422_0: * But from the way she TEXTS?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3423_0: * God, Little Buddy. She must be STACKED.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3428_0: * Little buddy!! Here to hear about my, heh, GIRLFRIEND!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3437_0: * So far, she's the perfect girl, little buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3440_0: * And to top it off... she sent me a picture.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3441_0: * Of herself. Wearing a pizza bikini.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3442_0: * Little buddy, perhaps it is uncouth, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3443_0: * Look!!! LOOK AT THIS!!!! GOD DAMN!!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3445_0: * (It's several pixels that vaguely resemble a zoomed-in JPEG of a pepperoni pizza.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3447_0: * Yes, I know what you're thinking, Little Buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3448_0: * Her camera. Is not. Of the highest caliber.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3449_0: * But to a scholarly man of the world like myself,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3450_0: * This is what love looks like, Little Buddy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3455_0: * That's right!! We don't need to say any more!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3456_0: * Go ahead and tell Asriel right now!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3474_0: * (You took a look at the flavors.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3486_0: * Heh, good idea. People put their mouth on those y'know.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3497_0: * HEY!! GET OUT OF THE ROAD!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3499_0: * Anything I can help you with, punk?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3507_0: * Huh? A super-dangerous alternate world in the Library?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3508_0: * More are appearing? People might fall inside...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3510_0: * Hahah... You seriously think I'm gonna believe that?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3518_0: * Nothing to report, huh? At times like this...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3519_0: * Punks like you should be home playing video games.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3564_0: * Hi Kris!! Getting your project done? Eheheh...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3565_0: * O... oh, my bike...? It's eh... eheh, totaled...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3566_0: * I... Um... I had a little crash, err...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3567_0: * You see, there was this p-police officer, and... er...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3569_0: * It's complicated. How are you doing?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3574_0: * K... Kris! D-did you need something...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3583_0: * Kris, it's no secret the, er, police in this town are...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3584_0: * Err... how do I put this... Just... um...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3587_0: * I mean they're s-symbolic! They barely do anything!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3588_0: * It's because of the mayor, there... there...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3590_0: * Makes me wonder if she even needs the police...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3591_0: * Or if they're just... g... getting in her way?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3592_0: * ... eheh sorry. I'm just saying what you already know.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3598_0: * Oh, how's your project going with, err... Susie?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3599_0: * What? Y-you went to the LIBRARY?! Together!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3600_0: * With Noelle and Berdly!? Th-that's amazing, Kris!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3601_0: * And, um... while you were there...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3602_0: * This has nothing to do with me, but the Teen Zone...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3603_0: * Seems to have some... g-good anime reviews, you know?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3604_0: * Not sure if you and the gang, were,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3605_0: * Ch-checking that out as you studied?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3606_0: * Next time you go you might want to...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3607_0: * Casually bring that up, among your fellow teens.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3608_0: * I... I know your dad liked Mew Mew 2 at least!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3609_0: * A-again, nothing to do with me!! Eheheh!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3615_0: * U-umm, there's, no school tomorrow though!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3628_0: * I missed you, y'hear!? Hahaha!! Missed you all day!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3641_0: * Y'hear... Y'hear closely for a second.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3643_0: * As my friend... Do you wanna... y'hear a secret?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3645_0: * Sometimes... I hear a song at night.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3646_0: * Just a little piece of a song, y'hear.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3647_0: * It sounds like... it's coming from under the water. Deep.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3651_0: * Oh, I'm about to make another friend! I can feel it, y'hear!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3653_0: * Do you wanna y'hear another secret...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3658_0: * ... I've heard that song before... coming from the sea.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3661_0: * But... I can't remember... I can't... Can't remember, y'hear!
