scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3689_0: * ... So what's it gonna be, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3697_0: * Yeah, let's just drop the act!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3698_0: * Our last adventure was great, right?!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3699_0: * I couldn't stop thinking about having another!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3700_0: * I don't know what's in there, but...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3708_0: * Like, you said a correct fact.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3711_0: * 'Cause when I see a big pit,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3712_0: * All I wanna do is jump in.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3713_0: * And as long as you're with me...

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3736_0: * Heard he got, like, a SUPER hot girlfriend.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3737_0: * What was her name? Like, uh....
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3739_0: * Anyway, what, did you like, wanna talk?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3743_0: * Lil Krissy. Come to visit me in my alley?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3744_0: * Hahaha. I'm a real alley-gator, aren't I~?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3755_0: * Today I like, went to the beach to play my uke, and...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3757_0: * That COPYCAT, playing the same song I wanted to play.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3758_0: * Oh my god. Cat on the beach. Grody.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3759_0: * Did she, like, get lost looking for the litter box?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3760_0: * So like, I try to like, play the same song, too...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3761_0: * To, you know, assert my ukelele dominance.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3762_0: * And we end up, ugh - get this -
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3764_0: * Like, oh my god, who does this girl think she IS?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3765_0: * She thinks she can just, like, HARMONIZE with me!?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3771_0: * (OMG, it's, like, SO sweet you have a nasty dirty little friend.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3772_0: * (But like... this is MY polluted alleyway? So like...)

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3955_0: * It's been a few years since my father passed on...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3956_0: * Fans of his famous book series, Lord of the Hammer...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3957_0: * We still received condolences from them until just recently.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3958_0: * A brave man, brilliant, and sharp.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3959_0: * Kris, it is a shame you were not able to have him as a teacher.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3960_0: * And, difficult for Ms. Alphys, as his replacement.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3961_0: * Let us pray that the Angel will smile upon her.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3970_0: * As per the ritual, a hammer is buried in the earth here.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3972_0: * To connect his spirit to the divine.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3973_0: * Originally a smith by trade, he began writing history...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3974_0: * And made a turn into telling stories,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3975_0: * As a means to entertain his children.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3976_0: * That such a story, created for a such a simple purpose,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3977_0: * Could blossom into such a large, wonderful, world-changing thing...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3978_0: * That is the majesty of words, Kris.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3980_0: * My father was blessed to have such a talent for writing.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3984_0: * Ah, Kris. Your brother. He is a very kind young man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3985_0: * Perhaps even a little... overzealous, in his younger days.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3986_0: * He would visit me often to confess... to various, "sins".
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3987_0: * Despite the absence of sin, or confession, in our religion.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3988_0: * I remember his small face, sobbing, as he admitted he had,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3989_0: * "Dropped the lizard in the pit to jump high."
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3990_0: * Nearly omitting the fact that he had done so in a "videos game."
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3991_0: * He also confessed to various "sins" on your behalf,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3992_0: * Begging for your forgiveness for "dropping the lizard on purpose."
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_3993_0: * I would always "forgive" him and send him home.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7511_0: * If you SPARE or PACIFY enough enemies of the same type, they will be RECRUITed.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7512_0: * RECRUITs will appear in your TOWN. Wonder what happens if you get them all...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7513_0: * You can check the area's RECRUIT status at SAVE POINTS. Certain BOSSES are excluded.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7519_0: * You will now have access to a STORAGE menu at SAVE POINTS.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7520_0: * When you're out of space, ITEMs you find or BUY will be sent to your STORAGE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_7521_0: * Feel free to put things inside you might not be able to use yet.

scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9876_0: * There you two are! I hope you have been...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9882_0: * Kris, Susie is the guest. Make an excuse for her.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9913_0: * (Zig zag rug... flatscreen TV... regular-looking kitchen...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9914_0: * (... it's a bit messy, but nothing special.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9972_0: * A pleasure seeing you young'uns here! Whatcha need?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9983_0_b: * If you're looking for wares, I've got a fair share.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9984_0: * Take a gander at that table down there! Wahaha!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_9985_0: * Everything in this study's mine, so lots for sale, lots for sale!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10020_0: * Me? Just writin'! Don't worry, it's easy, easy.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10021_0: * ... The hardest part is just sittin' down!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10038_0: * I hope one day y'all can do the same...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10049_0: * That knight-type thingy? Like I said, central door up top...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10050_0: * Oh! Big ol' sweet pumkin' boy gave you his Claws, did he?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10051_0_b: * With those, climbin' in the \cYEast Belltower\cW should be a cinch.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10052_0_b: * There oughta be a contraption there to help ya, I think!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10066_0: * That "knight" of yours? They went in that central door up top...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10067_0: * But, it's locked by a contraption in the \cYBelltower\cW.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10068_0: * Maybe the \cYNorthwest Library\cW's got somethin' for ya!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10087_0: * Seems the Central Door up the stairs is open now...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10088_0: * ... That oughta lead where you gotta go.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10096_0: * Enjoy yourselves! You got a lot ahead of you...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10110_0: * Um, that plaque up there about the Magic Axe...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10112_0: * Oh, the young miss wanted to chat about it, did she?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10114_0: * The hell did I say that?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10116_0: * I see, I see. Then, I'll just talk to myself about it a bit, then!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10117_0: * Legend has it... there's an axe hidden in these walls.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10118_0: * And whoever wields it... will have great magic power!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10119_0: * But, it ain't just hidden. It's locked away by some doohickey, yessir.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10120_0: * Maybe if ya search around, ya might figure somethin' out...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10123_0: * That magic power thing... think it'd work on everyone?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10125_0: * Well... it's worth a shot, ain't it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10128_0: * (Kris, let's try and find that Axe if we can...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10132_0: * Um, that plaque up there about the Magic Axe...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10134_0: * Oh, the young miss wanted to chat about it, did she?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10138_0: * Legend has it... there's an axe hidden in these walls.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10139_0: * And whoever wields it... will have great magic power!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10140_0: * But, it ain't just hidden. It's locked away by some doohickey, yessir.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10141_0: * Maybe if ya search around, ya might figure somethin' out...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10144_0: * That magic power thing... think it'd work on everyone?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10146_0: * Well... it's worth a shot, ain't it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10149_0: * (Kris, let's try and find that Axe if we can...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10154_0: * Legend has it... there's an axe hidden in these walls.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10155_0: * And whoever wields it... will have great magic power!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10156_0: * But, it ain't just hidden. It's locked away by some doohickey, yessir.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10157_0: * Maybe if ya search around, ya might figure somethin' out...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10166_0: * By the by, ain't it getting a bit drafty in here? I wonder why.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10173_0: * You still want the Axe? I'll give it to ya...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10175_0: * ... Nah. Not until I beat you.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10213_0_b:
Close eyes
for just a
moment
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10391_0: * Get ready, 'cause I'm not gonna hold anything back!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10397_0: * Sorry. We'll kick your ass later, old man.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10410_0: * (Susie looks like she has an idea...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10449_0: * ... what are these candles with peoples' names for, anyway?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10495_0: * (It seems to lead to a small closet... Check inside?)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10515_0: * (It's a set of bells of different sizes.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10517_0: * Look. I know you want to mess with these... But...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10588_0: * I FAICED MY HOARRORS, AND ESCAIPED DARK ZONE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10589_0: * NOW I CLEAN HAOUSE FOR OLDMAN! KIND OLDMAN, GIVES ME A DRINK CALLED "T".
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10590_0: * I NEVER FOARGET FRAINDS. HOW CAN I HELP?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10594_0: * I NEVER FOARGET FRAINDS. HOW CAN I HELP?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10609_0: * I HEARD A RUMMOR THAT THE RIGHTWARD ZONE... CONTAINS A BAEIOUTIFUL PAINO.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10610_0: * BE CAIREFUL. MANNY HOT PEOEPLES LIVE IN THAT PLACE.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10611_0: * CRUEL TO THOASE WITH A HOARRIBLE FACE... DO NOT LIKE
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10617_0: * I HEARD A RUMMOR THAT THE UPWARD MIDDLE DOOR... GOES TO FAEIOUNTAIN.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10618_0: * IF YOU DAIRE TO ENTER... WE WILL SAY GOODBYE! AND, I WILL CRY.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10619_0: * TEAERS OF WAX. YOU WILL NOT SEE... OUUUU...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10621_0: * Uhhh, we can bring you to our Castle Town...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10623_0: * NEW FRAINDS!? NO, THAT MAKES MOAR TEARS...!!!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10628_0: * WHAT??? I DOAN'T KNOW... I DOAN'T KNOW THAT...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10716_0: * (Sounds like someone put another sugar cube into your tea.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10737_0: * Really? Well, it'll only be hot now. Are ya sure?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10779_0: * ... You aren't gonna sleep, are you?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10823_0: * ... think we should go to school and check on him?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10841_0: * Whatever, I'll just go myself later.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10852_0: * i'm trying to direct traffic without undyne, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10866_0: * officer undyne? sorry, no one has seen her since last night
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10867_0: * ... she wasn't... at any of her usual places either...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10869_0: * it seems strange to worry, given that she's usually invincible
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10870_0: * but this job just isn't the same without her smile...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10874_0: * honestly, the town seems like a safer place without her
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10875_0: * fewer explosions, less mistaken crime, fewer arrests...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10876_0: * maybe she wasn't a great cop. but she was a great friend
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10877_0: * i hope she turns up soon
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10886_0: * the shelter...? right... undyne had been in charge of something about that
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10887_0: * an important code or some thing... it was the only thing that ever made her nervous
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10888_0: * ... i never saw it though. i don't think it's even in the station.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10892_0: * personally, that place gives me the creeps... i would never go there
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10893_0: * there are things that even ghosts are afraid of...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10894_0: * mostly... because of social anxiety. but sometimes, other things.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10905_0:
But Mom
could be
in there
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10929_0: * It's a box of odds-and-ends. Dig through?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10942_0: * You dug through the box and found...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10943_0: * A couple of burnt lighters, rusted multitool knives, expired rations,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10944_0: * Walkie talkies, loose binoculars, a pair of shoes fit for hooves,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10945_0: * Violent comic books, paintballs, a cracked hockey mask, frayed yarn and buttons,
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10946_0: * Your brother's retainer, and old mint cans with unique leaves inside of them.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10980_0: * (On the shelter was a strange panel.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10981_0: * (It looked like a digital security lock...)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10982_0: * (There were three entry fields, and three symbols beside them.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10983_0: * (One^3 had a pine tree beside it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_10984_0: * (One^3 had an officer's badge beside it.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11015_0: * Ah... yes. Carol and I have been... working together.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11016_0: * She's been funding my flower store, and in exchange...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11018_0: * You know, it's funny. Gardening was always my hobby.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11019_0: * Never my job. So, selling what I grow has been tough.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11020_0: * Flowers... are for people you love.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11021_0: * Giving them away... just seems natural, doesn't it?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11025_0: * I might look a little silly, but it's worth it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11026_0: * It will... all be worth it.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11035_0: * Oh, better than ever! With the Festival tomorrow...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11036_0: * ... I'm expecting record sales for my flowers!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11037_0: * With a bit of extra cash, I'll be back on my feet...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11038_0: * And ready to serve my own snack platter for you and Azzy!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11039_0: * ... there might even be some leftovers for your mother.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11043_0: * Pay me no mind, Kris. Go on. Your studies come first.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11044_0: * The Festival's tomorrow, so I've got plenty to do!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11096_0: * Keeping in mind this is just for fun...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11097_0: * Time your notes well to get \cYGOLD NOTES\cW.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11098_0: * Well, there might be some lag... just adjust on the fly.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11100_0: * But you can press ~1 or ~2 to play the notes, too. Or mix-and-match!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11101_0: * Made a mistake? Quit or restart by pressing ~1!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11157_0: * Oh my... I'm so starved for entertainment...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11158_0: * It greatly embarrasses me to ask this, but...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11159_0: * Would you two have anything I could watch?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11170_0: * Actually, we have like... this friend, Tenna...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11172_0: * Oh? They're like a little video boy?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11175_0: * They're kind of... broken right now.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11178_0: * Broken? Oh my, what are they, some kind of robot...?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11180_0: * No, they're just... I mean, we'll fix him. I think.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11184_0: * I see... well, thank you, darling.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11198_0: * Ooo la la. We are doing the wildlife fashion shoot!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11232_0: * If... if we jump here, we can make it back on...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11264_0: * (It's a door. A large person could fit inside.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11301_0: * Oh-ho, interested in my wares? Don't be shy, take a gander...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11318_0: * Hmm... the old man isn't here anymore...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11322_0: * We wanna take anything, we're leaving cash.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11329_0: * Umm, would you like anything, Kris?
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11354_0: * Oh, it ain't for me! It's for these fellas!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11355_0: * I gotta feed my sweet lil' recruits, don't I? Geh heh!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11361_0: * Whaddya think? Gotta save up for my retirement! Geheh!
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11376_0: * I'm... Love Master. Don't ask me about LOVE's.
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11385_0: * ... All right... LOVE... is when two people...
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11404_0: * (However, if you did, you might end up \cYmissing the entire day\cW.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11413_0: * (You forced your eyes open a little longer.)
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11457_0:
A tea that has deteriorated after a short while
due to its poor craftsmanship. +10HP
scr_text_slash_scr_text_gml_11509_0: * It seems to be locked with a code.

UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_2_0: I'm starting to lose track of the time.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_4_0: If someone told me it's been years, I might believe them...
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_6_0: And so many wonderful things happened that made time meaningful.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_7_0: Things like breakfast, or late night TV...
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_9_0_b: I don't eat or drink anymore.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_10_0_b: I can't tell if I'm awake or dreaming.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_11_0_b: I can't even tell if I'm dead or alive.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_12_0_b: It's just nothing but pitch black silence.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_14_0: The scratching noise I sometimes hear...
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_15_0: This sounds crazy, but even though no one can hear me,
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_16_0: When I hear that noise, I feel like someone's listening.
UNUSED_slash_UNUSED_gml_17_0: Anyone, if you're there... thank you.
